meanings.definition: To go somewhere in a hurry.
meanings.sent1: He hotfooted to the store to buy some milk before it closed.
meanings.sent2: The dog hotfooted to the door when it heard its owner's car pull up.
meanings.sent3: The penguin hotfooted to the water, excited to take a swim.
meanings.sent4: The idea hotfooted into her mind as she was falling asleep.
meanings.sent5: The horse hotfooted towards the finish line, determined to win the race.
